title: "Heavy drinking may impair men's ability to recognize facial emotions"
excerpt: "Alcohol intoxication is linked to impairments in the ability to interpret other people's facial expressions, especially in men, according to a new study. The findings may help explain why alcohol use is often associated with harmful interpersonal and social consequences,"
